description: The kits give same-day results and patients admitted to hospital with symptoms will be prioritised.
title: Coronavirus: On-island testing in Jersey available
title_page: Coronavirus: On-island testing in Jersey available - BBC News
maintext: Adrian O'Keeffe, pathology manager at Jersey General Hospital, said: "The ability to test for Covid-19 in Jersey means that people admitted to hospital can promptly be put onto the most appropriate treatment and they don't need to be held in isolation rooms for 48 hours pending their result."
